headline: Truist Lowers PayPal (PYPL) Estimates Due to Slower Volume, Take Rate Compression
summary: PayPal Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL) is one of the best stocks under $50 to invest in. On February 10, Truist lowered the firm’s price target on PayPal to $39 from $58 and kept a Sell rating as part of the firm’s broader research note. The note updated models for payment companies following Q4 2025 earnings. Truist […]
